comment: Restricting a simple graph by removing one vertex results in a simple graph. Remark: This restricted graph is not a subgraph of the original graph in the sense of ~ df-subgr since the domains of the edge functions may not be compatible. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)
